alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 4:03PM CDT until October 04 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MCINTOSH AND NORTHWESTERN PITTSBURG COUNTIES... At 403 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Indianola to 4 miles southeast of Scipio, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Krebs... Crowder... Alderson... Canadian... Indianola... Hanna... Arrowhead State Park... Scipio... Arpelar... Vernon... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
